scripts.copy: mkdir www || cp index.html www/index.html && cp -Rf styles/ www/styles/ && cp -Rf build/ www/build/ && rm -Rf www/assets && cp -fR assets www && cp src/service-worker.js www/service-worker.js && cp src/manifest.json www/manifest.json && cp sw-toolbox.js www/sw-toolbox.js
scripts.dev: webpack && npm run copy && webpack-dev-server --mode development
scripts.prod: webpack && npm run copy && webpack-dev-server --mode production
scripts.build: webpack --mode production && npm run copy && npx cap copy
